summary: An archer companion... With a few tricks up her sleeve.
descriptionHtml:
A wood elf companion with an icy disposition and a few magical tricks up her sleeve.
She's found in the Dawnstar Barracks, top floor.

Admittedly, that first bit isn't true- yet. the closest I could get in vanilla was the condescending female voice, which honestly just made me want to kill her. So for now, she's just even-toned. If any girls feel like volunteering their vocal talents, send me a PM and I'll give you some lines to try out.

Anyway, she's primarily an archer, with some Frost magic fallback. I'd recommend her for warrior or spell-sword type PC's, anyone who likes to get up close. Again, she's going to hopefully have a quest behind her, but Tina Snowfall (Found here- http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51786/?) is first on the list.

As usual, please playtest vigorously, review, and endorse if you like her.
author: Demonbane775
